name: KAMUROCHO'88 Portable
description:
This game actually is a demake of Yakuza 0 and made with GB Studio. This is my first fan game project. Now I want to focus to rebuild the world so the town maybe had no people except you. I want to make this fan game because I want to try to fit whole kamurocho district in one gameboy game, and of course I love the original game. Now this game just a prototype  and it contain just some part of tenkaichi street and I would adding more in the near future.oh and I forgot to say you need a Gameboy(the OG one) emulator for playing this game.Enjoy the prototype.

DISCLAIMER
This is a non-profit fan game created by a fan.
No financial gain is made from this project.

if you want to support the Dev (RGG Studio) Just buy their game it's great!
